name: lean4
description: Lean 4 language support for VS Code

lean4.toolchainPath.markdownDescription: Path to your Lean toolchain. Leave this blank to get the default location from your PATH environment or from the default elan install location.

lean4.input.customTranslations.markdownDescription: Add additional input Unicode translations. Example: `{"foo": "☺"}` will correct `\foo` to `☺`.

lean4.input.languages.markdownDescription: Enable Lean Unicode input in other file types.

items.description: the name of a language, e.g. 'lean', 'lean4', 'markdown'

lean4.input.leader.markdownDescription: Leader key to trigger input mode.

lean4.input.eagerReplacementEnabled.markdownDescription: Enable eager replacement of abbreviations that uniquely identify a symbol.

lean4.serverEnv.description: Environment variables to add to the Lean 4 server environment

lean4.serverEnvPaths.description: Paths to add to the Lean 4 server environment PATH variable.

items.description: a path to add to the environment

lean4.lakePath.markdownDescription: Path to Lake. Leave this blank to use the Lake from the toolchain.

lean4.serverArgs.description: Arguments to pass to the Lean 4 server.

items.description: an argument to pass to the server

lean4.serverLogging.path.description: Path to the directory where Lean 4 server log files are stored.

lean4.autofocusOutput.description: Automatically show the Output panel when the Lean 4 server prints a new message.

lean4.infoViewAllErrorsOnLine.markdownDescription: Infoview: show all errors on the current line, instead of just the ones on the right of the cursor.

lean4.infoViewAutoOpen.markdownDescription: Infoview: open infoview when Lean extension is activated for the first time.

lean4.infoViewAutoOpenShowGoal.markdownDescription: Infoview: auto open shows goal and messages for the current line (instead of all messages for the whole file)

lean4.infoViewStyle.markdownDescription: Add an additional CSS snippet to the infoview.

lean4.elaborationDelay.description: Time (in milliseconds) which must pass since latest edit until elaboration begins. Lower values may make editing feel faster at the cost of higher CPU usage.

commands.title: Restart Server
commands.description: Restart the Lean server (for all files).

commands.title: Restart File
commands.description: Restarts the Lean server for the file that is currently focused, refreshing the dependencies.

commands.title: Refresh File Dependencies
commands.description: Restarts the Lean server for the file that is currently focused to refresh the dependencies.

commands.title: Infoview: Display Goal
commands.description: Display the goal and any messages at the current position in the infoview.

commands.title: Infoview: Toggle
commands.description: Toggle whether the infoview is displayed.

commands.title: Infoview: Toggle "All Messages"
commands.description: Toggles the "All Messages" widget in the infoview.

commands.title: Infoview: Copy Contents to Comment
commands.description: Copy the contents of the currently active tactic state widget to a new comment on the previous line.

commands.title: Infoview: Toggle Pin
commands.description: Create or remove a tactic state widget pinned to show the goal at the current position.

commands.title: Infoview: Toggle Updating
commands.description: Pause / Continue live updating of the main tactic state widget.

commands.title: Select Lean Toolchain
commands.description: Select version of the Lean toolchain to use for this project.

commands.title: Show all abbreviations
commands.description: Show help page containing all abbreviations and the Unicode characters they map to.

commands.title: Open Documentation View
commands.description: Open documentation found in local 'html' folder in a separate web view panel
